name: df-resub
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2
body: |- wceq(cresub, cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, crio(s2, cr, wceq(co(cv(s1), caddc, cv(s2)), cv(s0)))))
comment: Define subtraction between real numbers. This operator saves a few axioms over ~ df-sub in certain situations. Theorem ~ resubval shows its value, ~ resubadd relates it to addition, and ~ rersubcl proves its closure. Based on ~ df-sub . (Contributed by Steven Nguyen, 7-Jan-2022.)
